text: Jacopo Lazzarini (born 22 August 1994), known professionally as Lazza, is an Italian rapper and record producer. Lazzarini was born in the Calvairate district of Milan. He studied piano at the Giuseppe Verdi Conservatory in Milan. He later joined the Zero2 and Blocco Recordz collectives. In 2009, he took part in the annual Italian hip hop event Tecniche Perfette. == References == Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Italian rappers Category:Italian record producers Category:Musicians from Milan
title: Lazza
